item.title: CVE-2022-42458|2024-08-03T13:10:40.834Z -- shift%20tech%20inc. -- bingo%21cms
item.description: Authentication bypass using an alternate path or channel vulnerability in bingo!CMS version1.7.4.1 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to upload an arbitrary file. As a result, an arbitrary script may be executed and/or a file may be altered.
